Package ohos.nfc.tag

Class IsoDepTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.nfc.tag.TagManager
      • ohos.nfc.tag.IsoDepTag

  • public class IsoDepTag
extends TagManager
    Provides interfaces to obtain IsoDepTag objects and tag information.

    This class is inherited from the TagManager abstract class and provides the methods to create IsoDepTag objects and obtain the higher layer response and historical bytes.

    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Communication#NFC

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static String EXTRA_HILAYER_RESP
      Indicates the keyword used to obtain the higher layer response of an ISO-DEP tag that is based on the NFC-B technology.
      static String EXTRA_HIST_BYTES
      Indicates the keyword used to obtain the historical bytes of an ISO-DEP tag that is based on the NFC-A technology.

      • Fields inherited from class ohos.nfc.tag.TagManager

        ISO_DEP, MIFARE_CLASSIC, MIFARE_ULTRALIGHT, NDEF, NFC_A, NFC_B, NFC_F, NFC_V

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor Description

      Obtains an IsoDepTag object based on the tag information.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IsoDepTag

        public IsoDepTag​(TagInfo tagInfo)
        Obtains an IsoDepTag object based on the tag information.

        During tag reading, if the tag supports the ISO-DEP protocol, an IsoDepTag object will be created based on the tag information.

        Parameters:
        tagInfo - Indicates the tag information.
        Since:
        1

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Optional<IsoDepTag> getInstance​(TagInfo tagInfo)
        Obtains an instance of IsoDepTag object based on the tag information.

        During tag reading, if the tag supports the ISO-DEP protocol, an IsoDepTag object will be created based on the tag information.

        Parameters:
        tagInfo - Indicates the tag information.
        Returns:
        IsoDepTag object
        Since:
        1

      • getHistoricalBytes

        public byte[] getHistoricalBytes​()
        Obtains the historical bytes of an ISO-DEP tag that is based on the NFC-A technology.
        Returns:
        Returns the historical bytes of the tag; returns an empty array with a length of 0 if the ISO-DEP tag is not based on the NFC-A technology.
        Since:
        1

      • getHiLayerResponse

        public byte[] getHiLayerResponse​()
        Obtains the higher layer response of an ISO-DEP tag that is based on the NFC-B technology.
        Returns:
        Returns the higher layer response of the tag; returns an empty array with a length of 0 if the ISO-DEP tag is not based on the NFC-B technology.
        Since:
        1
